ud2.8:1.3: _Mūḷha_ here has the sense of “gone astray” in reference to obstructed labor that prevents birth; see [mn86:14.2]().
ud2.8:15.4: _Lohitakumbhiya_ is probably a play on the common phrase _lohakumbhiya_, “copper pot”, which is commonly used in descriptions of hell. The boy, it seems, had an unusually rapid linguistic development.
